price: Kuma Muka bã shi iyalansa da kwatankwacinsu tãre da su sabõda rahama daga gare Mu, da tunãtarwa ga mãsu hankali.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهۡلَهُۥ وَمِثۡلَهُم مَّعَهُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lahu ahlahu wamith'lahum maʿahum raḥmatan minnā wadhik'rā li-ulī al-albābi
